Daniel Trupp, an undergrad in my lab, has made an #rstats package for reading and validating LI-6800 raw files.

We are releasing the alpha version today. 

If you have #6800life files and use R, plz read blog and try it out! Comments, criticism welcome.

https://t.co/nyLvIpTbGj

{datapasta} is one of the great #rstats Konomicode packages. Along with {clipr} (which datapasta depends) 

Tooling like this make exploration, discovery, and prototyping so much faster. Friction reducers are under appreciated. https://t.co/ItkPTcNp4a
